title: Agitator

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, choose to either appear Innocent or Suspicious.
- Your Destiny is considered fulfilled if you meet the conditions at the start of the night, and cannot be fulfilled during the day.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Accumulate 6 votes against you over any number of days, but not be hanged.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4220
*While the townsfolk hated the boy who riled them up each day, no one else was despised by the town more than the doctor who refused to condemn the boy.*
